text: The People's Institute for Survival and Beyond (PISAB) is an organization that educates people on issues that are related to social injustices such as racism. The organization was started in 1980 by Ronald Chisom and Dr. Jimm Dunn. The organization was started in New Orleans, Louisiana. == Programs conducted by the organization == # Undoing Racism program - The program involves training workshops organized by PISAB to educate participants against racism. # People's Institute Youth Agenda (PIYA) program - PIYA is a program in which the organization recruits youths to help in their trainings and workshops. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1980 establishments in the United States Category:Activism Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States
